graph_title: Proportion du budget total de la recherche allouée à la recherche sur les techniques marines
indicator_name: Proportion du budget total de la recherche allouée à la recherche sur les techniques marines
SDG_GOAL: Goal 14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
SDG_TARGET: Target 14.a: Increase scientific knowledge, develop research capacity and transfer marine technology, taking into account the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission Criteria and Guidelines on the Transfer of Marine Technology, in order to improve ocean health and to enhance the contribution of marine biodiversity to the development of developing countries, in particular small island developing States and least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 14.a.1: Proportion of total research budget allocated to research in the field of marine technology
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 14: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 14.a: Increase scientific knowledge, develop research capacity and transfer marine technology, taking into account the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission Criteria and Guidelines on the Transfer of Marine Technology, in order to improve ocean health and to enhance the contribution of marine biodiversity to the development of developing countries, in particular small island developing States and least developed countries
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 14.a.1: Proportion of total research budget allocated to research in the field of marine technology
